content: Dr. Nick Harvey - The University of British Columbia Dr. Nick Harvey | Research Homepage for Nick Harvey Search Computer ScienceDr. Nick Harvey (he/him) Home Papers Teaching People Pictures CV Affiliations Full Professor in the Department of Computer Science. Associate Member of the Department of Mathematics. Director of the Mathematics of Information, Learning and Data (MILD) research cluster. Research Interests Theory of machine learning, randomized algorithms, convex optimization Book I have been working on a draft textbook on randomized algorithms. Volume I. This is intended for use in an undergraduate course. I have used this as the text for UBC's pilot course CPSC 436R. Volume II. This is very much under construction. It is intended for use in a graduate course, and currently being used in CPSC 536N.
